title: ADC Looking for a high level OOL team to start off in
body:
I am free 24/7, very keen to practice, working mic and a professional manner.

I will want a trial to make sure the team I am applying for is one that shares the same mentality as I do.

If you have any question I will be happy to answer them in client.

ign: whitepumah

replies.body: That's ok, everyone's rank is inaccurate so my rank does not matter, only my ability to play the game matters.

Don't you think your embarrassing yourself. All the games you do good at which your one trick (twitch) are from games where you team mmr is higher than your enemy team.  Going  26/2 and 21/4 doesn't mean anything if everyone sees that your bullying silver 4s and silver 5s when your (GOLD V). You also tend to lose games and feed when you get matched with people are actually in your level range (GOLD V). 
If you can't beat people who are the same level as you, there is no chance for you to even mention joining high level OOL team.   
But an advice from a platimu... oh wait rank is inaccurate. An advice from a challenger mechanic skilled player who has God tier map awareness and is able to play any role, because that is totally my skill level because i went 30/0 in one game against bronze Vs who ran down mid like tyler 1 at 2 minutes. 

GET GUUD SCRUB

What the fuck are you smoking, the reason I get put with lower mmr players is because I am duoing with a silver 5 player who I need to support me so I can climb, cause 90% of the time my random support is worse than the enemy support so as ADC I and no one in my position can do anything to carry the game against a fed enemy team.

I consistently out perform "my level", I even consistently perform way above "my level".

I am going to be climbing really quickly thanks to everyone who is stupid enough to go ap carry supports on the enemy team and give me first blood cause they have 0 utility and are squishy asf.

I would only be embarrassing myself if I wasn't sure if I was asking for something I couldn't handle. In every other game I know exactly where my skill level is at and the 1v1 rank I have proves it, the same seems to hold true for this game as well except I have no 1v1 rank to prove it. Only my ability to play this game which is also a problem cause since no one is actually at the rank they deserve, higher ranked players think they know more even though they play like they are new to the game and therefore cannot accurately judge me cause they don't understand what they are looking at.

WhitePumah u are stupid lmfao. 

Gold trying to join a pro team. Funniest thing I have heard all game.
RANK DOES MATTER CAUSE IT DETERMINES YOUR SKILL BRAH

lets get some examples
2 days ago you went 26/2/3 as Twitch good job man it would be good if you weren't vs LOW SILVERS
Now lets go 3 days ago to when you went 2/8/1 when you vs LOW GOLD (your elo). 
And then 4 days ago 4/7/6 vs low golds again.

"consistently perform above your level" GOOD JOB KID YOUR LEVEL IS 5 RANKS LOWER THAT YOUR RANK

You see whats up???????

Don't try to join a good team when you cant beat low golds please

NightshadowB (B for bae) <3

Accept you are bad XD we are all bad unless we are diamond :( 
{{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:55}}

I saw a game where gosu unintentionally gave first blood to silvers in a smurf game.

GG Gosu is silver and is bad

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=vYQkBi2T,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-28T13:36:46.185+0000)
>
> I am going to be climbing really quickly thanks to everyone who is stupid enough to go ap carry supports on the enemy team and give me first blood cause they have 0 utility and are squishy asf.

How's that going for ya bud?
Went from bronze 1 to hitting plat promos 4 times, within about 2-3 weeks.
Mhm, have you done any 1v1s with any higher ranked players than you who main adc that you have beaten?

> [{quoted}](name=NIghtshadowb,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=vYQkBi2T,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-01T03:46:43.634+0000)
>
> Mhm, have you done any 1v1s with any higher ranked players than you who main adc that you have beaten?

No I have not done any 1v1's with any ADC mains.

So you claim that your 1v1's are OOL tier level. But you have never fought someone who was an adc main and is above your rank in 1v1. 
It's like trying to apply for a job as a real estate agent and claiming to be one of the best agents when you don't have a degree or have any experiences with real estate

You know OOL is an open league meaning people who have never played before could play in it.

Can you please quote me on where I claimed to be able to 1v1 anyone?

"In every other game I know exactly where my skill level is at and the 1v1 rank I have proves it, the same seems to hold true for this game as well except I have no 1v1 rank to prove it"

From this quote It is implied that you hold your 1v1 abilities very dearly and would say to be even say that it is better than your given Rank in solo queue

> [{quoted}](name=NIghtshadowb,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=vYQkBi2T,comment-id=000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-06T22:07:03.686+0000)
>
> "In every other game I know exactly where my skill level is at and the 1v1 rank I have proves it, the same seems to hold true for this game as well except I have no 1v1 rank to prove it"
> 
> From this quote It is implied that you hold your 1v1 abilities very dearly and would say to be even say that it is better than your given Rank in solo queue

The thing is I don't practice 1v1, but if this game had 1v1 mode, IT would reflect my actual ability because I would be playing it heaps. This is a 5v5 game though and it is the only game mode I practice.
Obviously a toxic asf player I don't want him in my games ever
Just leave it man white pumah has issues

> [{quoted}](name=SilkenFawn,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=vYQkBi2T,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-02-28T04:09:42.146+0000)
>
> Just leave it man white pumah has issues

My issue is with riot, I am just looking for other players at the higher level who can see just how obviously flawed the system is.

You've played in ools and gotten massacred by every team cause you played like a brainless monkey please

so flawed
